django-opensearch-xml documentation
===================================

A simple django application to add `OpenSearch <https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/XML/Guides/OpenSearch>`_ to django projects.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   opensearch_xml
